sentences.en: METHODS:100 patients of vaginitis were treated with unguent Kushen randomly by single blind.
sentences.cn: 方法：采用随机单盲方法，应用苦参软膏治疗阴道炎1 0 0例。

sentences.en: OBJECTIVE : To study the influence package on weight and appearance and active ingredient content of unguent.
sentences.cn: 目的: 考察包装对医院外用软膏制剂重量、外观性状和有效成分含量的影响.

sentences.en: Objective To explore the anti-inflammatory and analgesic action of Yantongxiao unguent.
sentences.cn: 目的观察炎痛消软膏的抗炎镇痛作用。

sentences.en: OBJECTIVE:To study the influence package on weight and appearance and active ingredient content of unguent.
sentences.cn: 前言： 目的：考察包装对医院外用软膏制剂重量、外观性状和有效成分含量的影响。

sentences.en: The doctor applied an unguent to the wound, which speedily healed it.
sentences.cn: 医生给伤口涂了些油膏, 伤口很快就愈合了.

sentences.en: This unguent relieves rheumatism , chills and pains, and is fit for use By rheumatism sufferers.
sentences.cn: 本药膏除湿散寒,祛风定痛, 适合风湿病人使用.

trans.tran_cn: 油膏，软膏，药膏，润滑剂，滑油
trans.tran_en: an oily substance used on your skin
